about_the_game:
Are you ready for a space adventure like no other? Look no further than 'Marbles in Space,' the action-packed rogue-lite game that will have you strategizing, battling, and upgrading for hours on end.

In this intergalactic game, your goal is simple: collect as many marbles as possible on each planet to eliminate your opponents one by one. But beware - the competition is fierce, and you'll need to outmaneuver and outsmart them at every turn.

The good news? Even when you lose, you win. Each defeat earns you experience and credits that you can use to unlock new skills and upgrades for your marbles. With dozens of levels and opponents with unique abilities, 'Marbles in Space' promises to keep you entertained and challenged for hours on end.

But the fun doesn't stop there. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter new challenges and obstacles that will test your skills and keep you on your toes. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, 'Marbles in Space' is the perfect game for anyone who loves action, strategy, and adventure.

So what are you waiting for? Blast off into the galaxy and take on the competition in 'Marbles in Space.' With endless possibilities and hours of entertainment, this game is sure to become your new favorite pastime.

name: Marbles in space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3rd Generation Intel i3 CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel i3 CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Embark on an intergalactic adventure in 'Marbles in Space.' Collect marbles and defeat opponents in this action-packed rogue-lite game. Earn experience and credits to unlock new skills and upgrades. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, it's the perfect game for action and strategy fans.
